caption.p: Analysis of research activities for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS). Research publications were classified into eight categories for COVID-19 (a, 1 December 2019 to 31 March 2020) and SARS (b, 1 November 2002 to 31 December 2003), respectively. Detailed study selection process, classification criteria are provided in the Supplementary material ( Appendix S1 and Table S1).
